pages.text: $(l)Aquamirae: Maritime Mysteries$() $(br2)Aquamirae introduces a world of maritime adventure to Minecraft, expanding the ocean depths with new structures, creatures, and treasures. Dive in and uncover the mysteries of the deep!

$(l)Key Features$() $(br2)- $(l)New Structures$(): Explore sunken ships, hidden temples, and ancient ruins. $(br2)- $(l)New Mobs$(): Encounter formidable sea creatures, from merfolk to ghostly pirates.

$(l)Rare Treasures$() $(br2)- $(l)Three Bolt Set$(): Special gear that provides underwater breathing. $(br2)- $(l)Terrible Set$(): Boosts swimming speed and poisons enemies. $(br2)- $(l)Frozen Keys$(): Unlocks frozen chests in the Ice Maze biome.

$(l)Survive the Depths$() $(br2)Prepare yourself for the ocean depths with the right gear and tactics. Arm yourself with tridents, potions, and a trusty diving helmet to survive the treacherous waters.
